channel.title: התחרות של גוגל – Code Jam 2021
channel.description:
מי שרוצה, מוזמן. אתם יכולים להניח שלא תקבלו את הפרס הגדול, אבל עדיין, זו אחלה הזדמנות להשתפשף קצת בפתרון בעיות :)
Code Jam is back for its 18th year — [register today](https://notifications.google.com/g/p/AD-FnExnA6zDdZAkYQlev6JxGPhkK1WnbDBgbYeTq0Qd_ztAuoBZy9IwDsIkFUvXFIzw1N-GeKQvPR12VZwd8HzwIQLDVtlQKlXwpOuFdF5dV2guIuCAng) for a chance to earn the title of Code Jam Champion at the Virtual World Finals and take home the grand prize of USD $15,000.
Here’s what you need to know about this year’s competition:
* The 30-hour Qualification Round begins on **Friday, March 26 @ 13:00 UTC**; registration will be open until the round ends. [Visit the schedule page](https://notifications.google.com/g/p/AD-FnEzyxRAj4lyG6TVibix18bURFeLdoh-xGnptmbg7BWgZIFbTzg1ZYZX13HrTgsVO1qC2o56PNwfDAFQzY-PpUYxFIICc8l5YO-9IJYMHFr3OvdauigaZrYnjlirP3A) to see your local timezone and add rounds to your calendar. * We've updated our language offerings this season — [review the FAQ here](https://notifications.google.com/g/p/AD-FnEziiT-fpAq-a0IQ5oC7hKYOTdwDpYA88bcNTb9s2n9e59itubGYh6AZfgfMEWRTylL1KWTEsqL3JgUQjSimu7EPTNQkPKVUOisbqYtHgHHe6CXJ1KV-_uw). * [Watch this video](https://notifications.google.com/g/p/AD-FnEz1nBzZwGlS4jyV3kTSldVyIX6VN2dYDIhDdOTivcLfotwB9uGz6s1xXVfA8byJyEP8xMslW7jKEcSdjJT2QBJd1zVUauinZsqjtYoPTu_03X05SsyAIATucMbZHvZMXZAIDcR2V-rL0yu2yTHbiXoZPDw5gX4rBp7pQhPDTw) to learn what we're looking forward to this season.
You can start warming up with [previous Code Jam problems](https://notifications.google.com/g/p/AD-FnEzOR1mpiNJw5bdN7Don3YRIGKwR_uS84ngsNTRF1MhCndcbsk7iHQuws90EMXFFXu5zNaZj0IBToLufBIjkbSlxZz8Z0r1yPsoJsB8Y2CLAd64nX9iRaA_gzLgf) and be sure to visit [g.co/codejam ](https://notifications.google.com/g/p/AD-FnExnA6zDdZAkYQlev6JxGPhkK1WnbDBgbYeTq0Qd_ztAuoBZy9IwDsIkFUvXFIzw1N-GeKQvPR12VZwd8HzwIQLDVtlQKlXwpOuFdF5dV2guIuCAng)for all other important information.
See you on the scoreboard! The Code Jam Team

item.title: התחרות של גוגל – Code Jam 2021
item.dc:creator: Yam
item.description:
מי שרוצה, מוזמן.
אתם יכולים להניח שלא תקבלו את הפרס הגדול, אבל עדיין, זו אחלה הזדמנות להשתפשף קצת בפתרון בעיות

Code Jam is back for its 18th year — register today for a chance to earn the title of Code Jam Champion at the Virtual World Finals and take home the grand prize of USD $15,000.

Here’s what you need to know about this year’s competition:

  • The 30-hour Qualification Round begins on Friday, March 26 @ 13:00 UTC; registration will be open until the round ends. Visit the schedule page to see your local timezone and add rounds to your calendar.
  • We’ve updated our language offerings this season — review the FAQ here.
  • Watch this video to learn what we’re looking forward to this season.

You can start warming up with previous Code Jam problems and be sure to visit g.co/codejam for all other important information.

See you on the scoreboard!
The Code Jam Team

קריאת הנושא במלואו
